SVGElementNonce.summary: The nonce property of the interface returns the nonce that is used by Content Security Policy to determine whether a given fetch will be allowed to proceed.

remarks.para:
- a similar method for HTML elements.
-nonce global attribute
-Content Security Policy
-CSP: {{CSP("script-src")}}

SVGElementNonce.value: A String; the cryptographic nonce, or an empty string if no nonce is set.
